BEAT 5: "We are aware of towering, angular shapes behind it, surrounding it on all sides."

BEAT 1: The Ursatz. Monophonic texture. Establishes the Tonic (I) (D Major). Pure consonance.
BEAT 2: Motivic Prolongation. Extends the Tonic time-span. Pastoral Rhythm (Free Meter).
BEAT 3: Visual Downbeat. The visual reveal acts as t=0 for the narrative clock.
BEAT 4: Harmonic Setting. Establishes the "Key" of the scene. Fragile structure (String Quartet).
BEAT 5: Polyphonic Dissonance. "Angular" shapes introduce conflicting key (Bitonality). "Sharp" rhythm.
BEAT 6: The Crash. Hypermetric Downbeat. Modulation to Dim7.
BEAT 7: Metrical Dissonance. Flute vs. Thud. Polyrhythm.
BEAT 8: The Call. Dominant Preparation (V). Sharp interjection.
BEAT 9: Deceptive Cadence. Resolution to False Tonic (vi). Suspended resolution.
BEAT 10: Reiteration. Repetition of Tonic. Attempt to establish "Home Key."
BEAT 11: The Discord. Non-chord tone. High tension.
BEAT 13: Rising Sequence. Chromatic ascent. Demands resolution.
BEAT 14: The Rest (Void). Sudden silence where beat should be.
BEAT 16: Fortissimo. Dynamic spike. Reiteration of False Tonic.
BEAT 18: Modulation (Minor). Shift to B Minor. Softening texture.
BEAT 19: Glissando. Descending pitch. Total tonal collapse.

BEAT 1: Open Manifold. No cuts. Subject ($$) not yet divided. Imaginary wholeness.
BEAT 2: Pre-Symbolic. "Grass and trees" = The Real before language slices it.
BEAT 3: The Frame. Curtain establishes boundary of the Phantasm (⋄a).
BEAT 4: The Locus. House is the Ego-Ideal (I(A)). Container for the subject.
BEAT 5: The Big Other (A). City represents the crushing weight of the Law.
BEAT 6: Catastrophe. Real (R) punctures Imaginary. S1​ fails to hold Drive.
BEAT 7: Split Subject ($$). Division between Perception and Consciousness.
BEAT 8: Interpellation. She names the subject to anchor him.
BEAT 9: Negation (¬). Willy asserts A=A (Identity) over Void.
BEAT 10: The Return. Vector attempts to close circle, but trajectory is broken.
BEAT 11: Hysteric's Question. $ interrogates S1​. Cuts wholeness.
BEAT 12: Demand for Cause (a). Demands "Object" behind failure.
BEAT 13: Iteration. Repeated demand for Truth (S2​) from Master.
BEAT 15: Naming the Real. "Car" = The Body/Drive. Specific trauma named.
BEAT 16: Master Signifier (S1​). Imposition of Law ("I said").
BEAT 17: Demand for Recognition. S1​ demands acknowledgement from Other.
BEAT 18: Imaginary Shift. Shift to Body/Health. Evading the Real.
BEAT 19: Death Drive. Vector points to "Bad Infinite."
BEAT 20: Limit Cycle. Trajectory circles the Hole (a).

BEAT 1: System initializes. "Flute" is reference signal for "Peace."
BEAT 2: Processing semantic embeddings of nature. No conflict.
BEAT 4: Central node House instantiated. Low structural integrity.
BEAT 5: GNN detects environmental stressors. House surrounded by Threat nodes.
BEAT 7: Agent filters "Consciousness" to focus on Survival.
BEAT 8: Linda attempts Reboot by calling Node ID.
BEAT 9: Willy overrides error. "All right" is a lie carried as Tech Debt.
BEAT 10: Claims loop completion, but GPS trace shows failure.
BEAT 11: Query acts as probe finding fault line.
BEAT 14: Node drops connection. Creates hole in graph.
BEAT 16: Agent attempts to overwrite Adversarial Input with Command.
BEAT 17: Agent checks if Output reached Regulator.
BEAT 18: Regulator shifts domain to "Health" to preserve bond.
BEAT 20: Logic loop. System cannot compute next step.

BEAT 2: Tr: Conscious Thought / Bs: Unconscious Drive.

BEAT 1: Note Name + Octave Number. (C4 is Middle C).

BEAT 2: Continuity: The Ego maintaining a smooth surface.

BEAT 1: Rapid repetition or short, detached notes.

BEAT 2: Trauma: A sudden spike in force (The Real).
Rupture: A violent break in the flow.
Ambiguity: Total lack of tonal center (Horror/Confusion).
Collapse: The ego losing its grip on the structure.
Repression: The voice is silenced or absent.
